last_episode_to_air.name: Blood Brothers Part 4
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's brother against brother in an all-out battle for the rule of Asgard! Thor will have his kingdom restored, even if it means Loki's life. But can the Prince of Lies be redeemed…or is his evil beyond even the power of Thor?

name: Thor & Loki: Blood Brothers
overview: Inspired by the acclaimed graphic novel from Robert Rodi and Esad Ribic, Marvel Knights Animation's "Thor & Loki: Blood Brothers" takes a powerful look inside the minds of Thor & Loki, brothers in the mythical land of Asgard and seemingly forever enemies. But just why does Loki hate his brother Thor? And could it be that this master of mischief isn’t really the villain he’s been branded? Loki's insatiable lust for power and his feud with Thor take on new meaning in this resonant epic.

episodes.name: Blood Brothers Part 1
episodes.overview:
The mighty Thor has been broken! Cruel and envious Loki has seized all of Asgard and marked his brother for execution.
But can Odin’s most powerful son escape his captor’s dungeon to claim the throne that is rightfully his own?

episodes.name: Blood Brothers Part 2
episodes.overview: The roots of Loki's madness are laid bare as he taunts and tortures Thor's loved ones. But will the rest of Asgard's royals tolerate the rule of his iron fist? And what punishment is Thor plotting for his arrogrant brother?

episodes.name: Blood Brothers Part 3
episodes.overview: Thor's past, present and future stand revealed! But what of Loki's darkest secrets? What knowledge has the almighty Odin hidden away ... and what will Thor do when it threatens to topple Asgard itself?

episodes.name: Blood Brothers Part 4
episodes.overview: It's brother against brother in an all-out battle for the rule of Asgard! Thor will have his kingdom restored, even if it means Loki's life. But can the Prince of Lies be redeemed…or is his evil beyond even the power of Thor?
